The way to make all discerning lovers of truth of one mind: for the stronger opposition of those who would ruine them with errours and discords flowing from them. / By A lover of truth and peace ; published with authority. Lover of truth and peace.
[2], 36 p.
Printed by N.T. at the Entrance into the Old-Spring-Garden near Charing-Cross, London, : M DC LXXXVII [1687]
Errata on p. 36. Reproduction of original in: Lambeth Palace Library, London, England.
